plot: This is an "unrequited" love story about a black filmmaker, Jason Street in love with his best friend, JoJo. When his friends hatch a plot to blackmail another mate, Charlie whom owes money to the Russian mob whom actually want to get in to the film biz, they say its all in service of helping Jason solve his love life. But how can he write the ending of his story in one weekend when he doesn't ...
title: One Way Love
